tool_description: Disposable Email Validation and Verification check against >150K unique domains. Detect if an Email is from a Disposable Email Address Services.
name: Disposable Email Validation
title: Disposable Email Validation

api_list.name: Validate domain or email address
api_list.description: Validate can either be a domain ( **spam4.me** ) or an email address ( **badactor@spam4.me** )
